mapper.update: update sys_perm set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perm_module_id = #{permModuleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_ip = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, name, perm_module_id, url, type, status, seq, remark, operator, operate_time, operate_ip from sys_perm where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, code, name, perm_module_id, url, type, status, seq, remark, operator, operate_time, operate_ip from sys_perm
